channel.title: How can I mod the Login Screen? ~Explained in thread~
channel.description:
Hey, 1st Problem: First I will show a picture of my Login screen:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ws6x6r.png[/img]
First I want to know how to remove the "Information" clickable thing. So the only thing thats clickable is the "Login"
2nd Problem:
And now to my 2nd problem yes... When I enter my username and password, I don't want this: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/16k9s9j.png[/img] The pink arrows show what I don't want. I want that I can make a new sprite for the second level of the loginbox. Like a "TITLEBOX 2" Because the button that I have drawn on the sprite is the button for the goto login screen button.
If you don't understand my question/problem then please ask a question about what I mean so you can try to help me.
~Segun24 - Nickname / DracoWizard2 - MoparScape

item.title: How can I mod the Login Screen? ~Explained in thread~
item.dc:creator: @dracowizard2 dracowizard2
item.description:
@dracowizard2 wrote:

Oh =(
I want to change it, I’m not super desperate, but I
really want it done.

~Segun24[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 10:29:22 pm[/size][hr]Can you hurry people?
Are no one viewing this topic?

~Segun24

Read full topic

item.description:

Hey,
1st Problem:
First I will show a picture of my Login screen:

ws6x6r.png765×503

First I want to know how to remove the “Information” clickable thing.
So the only thing thats clickable is the “Login”

2nd Problem:

And now to my 2nd problem yes…
When I enter my username and password,
I don’t want this:

The pink arrows show what I don’t want.
I want that I can make a new sprite for the second level of the loginbox.
Like a “TITLEBOX 2”
Because the button that I have drawn on the sprite is the button for the goto login screen button.

try to help me.
